casebody.data:
ELWOOD SWANK AND RITA SWANK v. THE UNITED STATES BLACK HAWK COAL CORPORATION, INC. v. THE UNITED STATES BULL RUN MINING CO., INC. v. THE UNITED STATES No. 403-75 No. 49-77 No. 400-77 [221 Ct. Cl. 246, 602 F. 2d 348]

[451 U.S. _]

On November 30, 1979 the court entered judgment for plaintiffs Swank in the amount of $35,806.07 and on December 7, 1979 entered judgment for plaintiff Bull Run Mining Co., Inc. for $20,960.43 and plaintiff Black Hawk Coal Corp. for $164,131.03, with statutory interest in each case.
